hero.description: We make your business stand out in the digital world with our software, agency, and consulting services.

manifesto.part1: We don't just see the digital world as a space; we are a team that shapes, develops, and transforms it. We are here to turn innovative ideas into reality. We don't just use technology; we aim to push its boundaries.
manifesto.part2: We are a young, dynamic, and creative team. We quickly adapt to the changing world, follow the latest trends, and make a difference in every project. We think outside the box, produce original solutions, and help brands establish a strong presence in the digital world.
manifesto.part3: For us, every line of code, every design, every strategy carries meaning. We see our work not just as a technical process, but as an art. We meticulously handle every detail to help our clients achieve their goals, developing projects not just to complete them, but to deliver the best.
manifesto.part4: We are here for everyone who wants to break the mold in the digitalizing world. We exist for bold ideas, powerful technologies, and projects that transcend boundaries. Because we are not just a team; we are a vision building the future.

items: We don't just see the digital world as a space; we are a team that shapes, develops, and transforms it.
We are a young, dynamic, and creative team. We quickly adapt to the changing world and follow the latest trends.
For us, every line of code, every design, every strategy carries meaning. We see our work as an art.
We are here for everyone who wants to break the mold in the digitalizing world.

api.title: API Development

agency.title: Agency Services

agency.longDescription: We provide all the creative and strategic services your brand needs to make a difference in the digital world. Comprehensive agency services from UI/UX design to social media management, content creation to brand identity development.

consulting.longDescription: We provide strategic consulting services that your business needs in its digital transformation journey. Comprehensive solutions from technology selection to project management, from business process optimization to risk management.

strategy.title: Business Strategy

meta.title: Our Projects - App Design House
meta.description: Explore our successful projects developed with modern technologies and creative solutions.

hero.description: Discover our projects that stand out in their respective fields, developed with modern technologies and centered around user experience.

petSocial.title: Pet Social
petSocial.subtitle: Social Media and More for Pets
petSocial.description: An innovative social media platform that brings pet lovers and their furry friends together.
petSocial.longDescription: Pet Social is an innovative social media platform that brings pet lovers and their furry friends together. By creating a community specially designed for pet owners' lovely companions, we gather all their needs under one roof.

socialNetwork.title: Social Network
socialNetwork.description: Photo and video sharing, interaction, and information exchange capability.

marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.description: Secure shopping platform for food, toys, care products, and accessories.

vetTracking.title: Veterinary Tracking
vetTracking.description: Digital record of vaccination schedules, health checks, and treatment processes.

optiFusion.title: OptiFusion
optiFusion.subtitle: Digital Marketing Optimization Platform
optiFusion.description: Multi-platform advertising integration and AI-powered advertising management.
optiFusion.longDescription: OptiFusion was developed with a single-point management approach to increase your efficiency in digital marketing. By integrating different advertising channels and 10 different CRM data including HubSpot and Salesforce, it enables businesses to manage their marketing budgets and customer relationships end-to-end.

adIntegration.title: Ad Integration
adIntegration.description: Single platform management for Meta, Google, LinkedIn, TikTok Ads.

crmIntegration.title: CRM Integration
crmIntegration.description: Automatic matching of CRM data with advertising data.

aiOptimization.title: AI Optimization
aiOptimization.description: AI-powered budget and target audience optimization.

travelTaste.title: TravelTaste
travelTaste.subtitle: Smart Travel Planning Assistant
travelTaste.description: A mobile application powered by real-time data that creates personalized travel routes based on your budget and preferences.
travelTaste.longDescription: TravelTaste is an innovative mobile application that helps users plan travel routes according to their budget and preferences. Powered by real-time data from Google Places API, the app offers personalized travel experiences and creates the most suitable routes based on user preferences.

routePlanning.title: Smart Route Planning
routePlanning.description: Create personalized travel routes based on budget and preferences.

realTimeData.title: Real-Time Data
realTimeData.description: Up-to-date location and venue information with Google Places API.

customization.title: Customization
customization.description: Personal preferences in categories like food, culture, nature, and entertainment.

offlineAccess.title: Offline Access
offlineAccess.description: Access to basic features without an internet connection.

penGuard.title: PenGuard
penGuard.subtitle: Automated Web Penetration Testing Platform
penGuard.description: A modern penetration testing tool built on microservice architecture capable of comprehensive security scans.
penGuard.longDescription: PenGuard is an advanced penetration testing platform built on microservice architecture that automates web application security tests. It detects common security vulnerabilities like SQL Injection, XSS, CSRF, generates detailed reports, and provides continuous monitoring capabilities.

securityScans.title: Security Scans
securityScans.description: Automated security tests for SQL Injection, XSS, CSRF, and more.

detailedReporting.title: Detailed Reporting
detailedReporting.description: Comprehensive security reports and solution recommendations in PDF and HTML formats.

microservices.title: Microservice Architecture
microservices.description: Modular structure with Gateway, Auth, Scanner, and Report services.

monitoring.title: Monitoring System
monitoring.description: Real-time metric tracking with Prometheus and Grafana.

airy.title: Airy
airy.subtitle: Smart Air Quality Monitoring System
airy.description: A comprehensive mobile application that tracks, analyzes real-time air quality data and informs users.
airy.longDescription: Airy is an innovative mobile application that monitors air quality data in real-time and informs users about potential health risks. With GPS integration and advanced mapping features, you can view detailed air quality in your area, analyze historical data, and receive instant notifications in critical situations.

realTimeMonitoring.title: Real-Time Monitoring
realTimeMonitoring.description: Instant tracking of pollutants like PM2.5, PM10, CO, NO2, SO2, O3.

locationBased.title: Location Based
locationBased.description: Air quality analysis of your area with GPS integration.

notifications.title: Smart Notifications
notifications.description: Instant push notifications for critical air quality levels.

offlineSupport.title: Offline Access
offlineSupport.description: Access to latest data without an internet connection.

screenshots.dashboard: Main screen and air quality indicators

seo_section.title: How Custom Package Works?
seo_section.paragraph1: At App Design House, we offer solutions tailored to your needs. With our custom package creation tool, you can select the most suitable services from our software, agency, and consulting offerings, and receive a customized quote based on your budget and timeline.
seo_section.paragraph2: Based on your selected services, our expert team will contact you to discuss the details of your project and provide a customized solution. You can choose from our software development, web design, mobile application, digital marketing, or consulting services to take your business to the next level.
